'(
wordrule
(
  (ruleid "EBL::ABNORMAL-AORTA::2018/11/08 00:51:47") 
  (specialized) 
  (example-snippet "Aorta is ectatic") 
  (ordered true) 
  (sourceid "anatomic-location-is-property-rule") 
  (concept ":ABNORMAL-AORTA:") 
  (stype "<CHEST-XRAY-FINDING-THING>") 
  (window 16.0) 
  (words 
    (":AORTA:") 
    (":ECTATIC:")) 
  (tests 
    ("notneg" ?0) 
    ("notneg" ?1)))

)
